carrotconfigtest.carrotconfig.title: carrotconfigtest Configuration!
carrotconfigtest.carrotconfig.intTest.to:
Denotes the maximum time (in minutes) a chunk can have a player in its vicinity before biome toasts are prevented from showing within its borders.

(§oHigher values may be preferable for high-player worlds!§r§r)
Denotes the time (in minutes) a biome toast will be prevented from showing again (§oper biome§r).
This is a color test for carrotconfigtest mod!
